trans-unit.source: Controls access to stores containing X.509 certificates.
This class cannot be inherited.
<xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> controls the access that code is granted to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> Controla o acesso que o código é concedido a x. 509 armazena.

trans-unit.source: The permission is based on flags representing the access levels that apply to every store.
trans-unit.target: A permissão se baseia em sinalizadores que representa os níveis de acesso que se aplicam a cada loja.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class with either fully restricted or unrestricted permission state.
The permission object provides either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o objeto de permissão totalmente restrito (`None`) ou `Unrestricted` acesso a repositórios de x. 509.

trans-unit.source: If fully restricted (`None`), the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> property can then be set to specify the type of access allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se totalmente restrito (`None`), o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> propriedade, em seguida, pode ser definida para especificar o tipo de acesso permitido.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission" /> class with the specified access.
The `flag` parameter specifies the permitted access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: O `flag` parâmetro especifica o acesso permitido para lojas de x. 509.

trans-unit.source: The specified permitted access applies to all stores.
trans-unit.target: O acesso especificado se aplica a todos os repositórios.

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to specify access to an individual store.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível especificar o acesso a uma loja individual.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="flags" /> is not a valid combination of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> values.
Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.
A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia de uma permissão representa o mesmo acesso a recursos como a permissão original.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Store" /> access allowed by the current permission.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> property specifies the permitted access to X.509 stores.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Flags%2A> propriedade especifica o acesso permitido para lojas de x. 509.

trans-unit.source: X.509 stores are physical stores used to persist and manage X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Repositórios de x. 509 são os repositórios físicos usados para manter e gerenciar certificados x. 509.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
See <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermissionFlags" /> for the valid values.
Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.

The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> method reconstructs a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> object from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> método reconstrói um <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission> objeto a partir de uma codificação de XML definido pelo <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.ToXml%2A> método para codificar o XML de <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission>, incluindo informações de estado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="e" /> is not a valid permission element.
-or-
The version number in <paramref name="e" /> is not valid.
A permission to intersect with the current permission.
It must be of the same type as the current permission.
Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations that both permissions describe in common.
trans-unit.target: A interseção de duas permissões é uma permissão que descreve o conjunto de operações que ambas as permissões descrevem em comum.

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Somente uma demanda que passa as permissões originais passará a interseção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> s not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
A permission to test for the subset relationship.
This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
<see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: A permissão atual é um subconjunto de permissão especificada se a permissão atual especifica um conjunto de operações é totalmente contido pelo conjunto de permissões especificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma permissão que representa acesso à C:\example.txt é um subconjunto de uma permissão que representa acesso na unidade c:\\.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método retornar `true`, a permissão atual não representa nenhum mais acesso ao recurso protegido que a permissão especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
<see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: Uma permissão irrestrita representa acesso a todos os recursos protegidos pela permissão.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> that contains an XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.FromXml%2A> método para restaurar as informações de estado de um <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
It must be of the same type as the current permission.
Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de uma chamada para <xref:System.Security.Permissions.StorePermission.Union%2A> é uma permissão que representa todas as operações representadas pela permissão atual e a permissão especificada.

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer solicitação que passa a ter a permissão passa seu union.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
